amendment.description: To improve coordination of Federal efforts to identify and mitigate health and national security risks through a monitoring system to map essential medicine supply chains using data analytics.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3753 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3753 proposed by Senator Wicker for Senator Peters to Amendment SA 3748. To improve coordination of Federal efforts to identify and mitigate health and national security risks through a monitoring system to map essential medicine supply chains using data analytics.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3753 proposed by Senator Wicker for Senator Peters to Amendment SA 3748.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3753 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
